title: One third of UK adults will run out of money by the end of January, survey says
description: One third of UK adults will run out of money by the end of January due to higher winter bills and financial strain from Christmas expenses, a survey says. Personal finance company Credit Karma found that 56% of those who will run out of money during the month will have spent their entire monthly income by January 20.

title: Snow and ice to be replaced by wind and rain as country thaws
description: Snow and ice is set to be replaced by wind and rain as milder air returns to the UK. An amber warning for snow is still in force for northern parts of Scotland, but Arctic air will start to be displaced, the Met Office said.

title: Astronauts head to space station on chartered flight
description: Turkey’s first astronaut, a Swede and an Italian have set off for the International Space Station on a chartered SpaceX flight. description: More strike action is on the cards across Northern Ireland unless public sector workers receive their long-awaited pay award. title: Is the tide finally turning for unloved UK stocks?
description: To say the UK stock market has fallen out of favour in recent years is something of an understatement. At this point, it is looking rather friendless. But some plucky diehards are asking the question one more time with feeling: is it time to buy UK stocks?
